desc.en: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.jp: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千禧年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃井。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到一封怪信，于是便前往千年学园的游戏开发部，在该处见到开发游戏中的双胞胎学生，绿和桃。

desc.en: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei hears about a strange story about a hero.
desc.jp: With a muddy and confused mind, Sensei hears about a strange story about a hero.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在意识模糊之际，听到了一段奇怪的关于勇者的故事。

desc.en: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Department. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.jp: Sensei finally woke up and found himself at the Game Development Department. He was later told that the reason why he lost consciousness, was because of the direct hit by the PreyStation that Momoi threw out of the window. Momoi and Midori mentioned about their letter.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃井扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃井和绿提到了他们的那封信。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师最终醒了过来，发现自己到了游戏开发部，并得知是被桃扔出窗外的PreyStation砸中了才昏迷过去。桃和绿提到了他们的那封信。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Arona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Sensei received the letter from GDD, knowing that they were going to be closed. Arona made a simple introduction about the Millennium School.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿罗娜顺便介绍了一些千禧年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；彩奈顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师收到了游戏开发部的信件，并从中得知了游戏开发部将要被废社的消息；阿洛娜顺便介绍了一些千年学院的概况。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - it was at this moment when everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori made an formal self-introduction to Sensei again and proposed to go to the Ruins altogether. She mentioned that the closure was declared by Yuuka - it was at this moment when everyone was interrupted by a familiar voice.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃和绿向老师做了自我介绍，并提议一起前往废墟；同时提及废社是优香要求的——然而，此时众人却被一阵声音打断。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.jp: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到妮露在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。爱丽丝突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和爱丽丝交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Aris believed that the further the location, the more events would occur. And indeed they met C&C members Asuna and Karin, who were just on special missions. They exchanged a few and at last Karin mentioned that Neru was looking for Aris.
desc.jp: Aris believed that the further the location, the more events would occur. And indeed they met C&C members Asuna and Karin, who were just on special missions. They exchanged a few and at last Karin mentioned that Neru was looking for Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝确信在更远的地方能够触发更多事件，而他们也的确正好遇到了执行特殊任务的C&C成员明日奈和花凛。几人交谈了几句，最后花凛提到尼禄正在找爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝确信在更远的地方能够触发更多事件，而他们也的确正好遇到了执行特殊任务的C&C成员明日奈和花凛。几人交谈了几句，最后花凛提到宁瑠正在找爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝确信在更远的地方能够触发更多事件，而他们也的确正好遇到了执行特殊任务的C&C成员明日奈和花凛。几人交谈了几句，最后花凛提到妮露正在找爱丽丝。

desc.en: C&C spotted two Gehenna students and said they were going to transfer to Gehenna and wanted to know some details. Hearing that Neru was looking for her, Aris decided to retreat back to Millennium.
desc.jp: C&C spotted two Gehenna students and said they were going to transfer to Gehenna and wanted to know some details. Hearing that Neru was looking for her, Aris decided to retreat back to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C发现了两位歌赫娜学生，表示自己是准备转学的，想打听些消息。听到了尼禄正在找她的爱丽丝决定先撤离回千禧年。

desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃井，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃井而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的桃，接获绿的联系后，便去找窝在游戏开发部的爱丽丝。尽管老师给予了安慰，但爱丽丝依旧因为自己伤害了桃而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃井不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了夏莱的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在与爱丽丝的混战中，桃不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了沙勒的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于爱丽丝的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.jp: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.zh_cn: 柚子和绿向老师请求协助，爱丽丝一直待在游戏开发部的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.jp: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃井的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对自己给众人，尤其是桃的伤害自责不已。爱丽丝表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.jp: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在爱丽丝讲不下去话的时候，莉央突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在爱丽丝讲不下去话的时候，莉音突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在爱丽丝讲不下去话的时候，莉央突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.jp: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room
desc.zh_cn: neru aris arcade game store shop indoor artificial light room

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千禧年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事情告一段落。莉音消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.jp: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 日鞠向老师表示，埃里都已经封存，后事将由她进行负责。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 今日の運勢の確認、オカルト全般
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 确认今天的运势、所有的神秘事物

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长尼禄康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长宁瑠康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。季因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: C&C邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长妮露康复出院。明日奈提出了兔女郎装的主意。时因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为C&C的一员。

desc.en: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.jp: The Engineering Department were developing new stuff as always. Veritas were working closely with Super Phenomenon Task Force. Sumire resumed her daily exercises.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。真理社和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程师部一如既往的开发着新东西。贝里塔斯和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 工程部一如既往的开发着新东西。真理会和特异现象搜查部一起工作。堇也恢复了日常的锻炼。

hobby.jp: トレーニング、ガーデニング

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了游戏开发部，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。爱丽丝邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: 忍術研究部為了執行特殊任務來到了大雪原。但出現在眼前的無名守護者比想像中還要多，一行人因此陷入了危機當中…出乎意料的援軍突然從天而降。
desc.jp: 忍術研究部為了執行特殊任務來到了大雪原。但出現在眼前的無名守護者比想像中還要多，一行人因此陷入了危機當中…出乎意料的援軍突然從天而降。
desc.zh_cn: 忍术研究部为了运行特殊任务来到了大雪原。但出现在眼前的无名守护者比想像中还要多，一行人因此陷入了危机当中…出乎意料的援军突然从天而降。

desc.en: 萬魔殿的加入讓忍術研究部得以脫離險境。一行人再次踏上旅程去執行特殊任務。基於認為任務已經完成，萬魔殿便回去了。
desc.jp: 萬魔殿的加入讓忍術研究部得以脫離險境。一行人再次踏上旅程去執行特殊任務。基於認為任務已經完成，萬魔殿便回去了。
desc.zh_cn: 万魔殿的加入让忍术研究部得以脱离险境。一行人再次踏上旅程去运行特殊任务。基于认为任务已经完成，万魔殿便回去了。

desc.en: 忍術研究部在雪原裡見到的敵人越來越多，懷疑訊息究竟是怎麼洩露出去的。
desc.jp: 忍術研究部在雪原裡見到的敵人越來越多，懷疑訊息究竟是怎麼洩露出去的。
desc.zh_cn: 忍术研究部在雪原里见到的敌人越来越多，怀疑消息究竟是怎么泄露出去的。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
